name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: url2md - Copy url as markdown format

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy & Convert Url to Markdown format - 方便markdwon写作的小工具，复制url转成markdown格式

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
1. 支持划词选择；
2. 支持过滤“小尾巴”；
3. 支持 Unicode 字符切换；

eg1：https://www.google.com => [Google](https://www.google.com)
eg2：https://xxx.com/1.jpg => ![img alt](https://xxx.com/1.jpg)

详细操作说明: https://github.com/Mr-houzi/url2md/blob/master/README.md
long.en:
copy url, title, image as markdown format

1. Support to slide your mouse left and right, and select text as title；
2. Support to filter website title suffix；
3. Support to unicode string；

eg1：https://www.google.com => [Google](https://www.google.com)
eg2：https://xxx.com/1.jpg => ![img alt](https://xxx.com/1.jpg)

manual: https://github.com/Mr-houzi/url2md/blob/master/readme-en.md
